title: Jeff Van Gundy
description:
Zach and ESPN's Jeff Van Gundy reflect on the three series that ended Thursday, preview the conference semifinals, talk Zion, the future of the Pelicans, change coming in Utah, much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
